screenSpace(double, double) - Method in class ca.gkelly.engine.graphics.Camera

setMag(double) - Method in class ca.gkelly.engine.util.Vector
Set the magnitude of the vector
Negative magnitudes will mirror the vector
setManager(Manager) - Method in class ca.gkelly.engine.graphics.Window
Set the active manager
This will call end() on the old manager and init() on the new one

setPosition(double, double) - Method in class ca.gkelly.engine.loader.Entity

STRING_COMPONENT - Static variable in class ca.gkelly.engine.util.Vector
To be passed to getString(), indicates that the output will be full components
STRING_NORMALIZED - Static variable in class ca.gkelly.engine.util.Vector
To be passed to getString(), indicates that the output will be normalized components
STRING_POLAR - Static variable in class ca.gkelly.engine.util.Vector
To be passed to getString(), indicates that the output will be polar coordinates
